attributes.title: we needed obama 👑
attributes.review:

attributes.title: What the heck?
attributes.review: I do not understand why people would download this app. It’s horrible and just simply does not work. Would not recommend just a waste of time.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: It makes my phone glitch so bad. I almost had to replace my phone if it’s wasn’t for me deleting the app. Save your time and don’t download it it will break your phone

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever used. It keep glitching and giving me misinformation. I would suggest never downloading this app because all you will receive is disappointment.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review:
The app in of itself is horrible....
Not only is there racist comments everywhere, but but it glitches all the time.
I wouldn’t waste your time downloading it or by voting for Trump...

attributes.title: Don’t get
attributes.review: This is just a bad app in general! Crashes a lot, take a long time to load (trust me my WiFi is amazing based off that I am able to game on it) and it is not visually appealing.

attributes.title: It’s horrible don’t download it at all
attributes.review: It’s a horrible app with horrible people it’s filled with people I don’t like just like people at my school I don’t like it don’t recommend getting it🤢🤮

attributes.title: Wow I’m disappointed
attributes.review: Honestly this app is beyond what words can say, this apps makes me disgusted and ashamed of the man who we call president today. I’m surprised a app like this is even on the apple store I’m disappointed.

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: This app made my phone blink on and off and my phone is glitching really bad and the vibe on that app I just can’t have it on my phone it’s a terrible app and I just don’t want it on App Store

attributes.title: Bad quality
attributes.review: When I first downloaded this app it took a while and when I logged in to it my iPhone was lagging a lot, it gave bad instructions, so i rate it a one
